answers.answer: It might just happened for no big reason but if u conserned go to hospital doctor or call your midwife no one here will actually know as we not experts.
If your blood pressure was high too it would be something to be very concerned about..pregnancy itself can cause some vision problems..i wouldnt worry but be no harm to checked over by your doctor
Blurred vision is a late sign of preeclampsia. You would be having other symptoms first.

question: I've got blurred vision lately and when I searched on the Internet about it,  I found this can be a symptom of preeclemsia.  I'm 28 weeks now and my blood pressure is ok. I've always had eye problems so I believe that my eyes are affected by hormones but this cloudiness appeared very suddenly a few weeks ago. Should I worry ?
title: preeclemsia
